question: a certain bag of gemstones is composed of two - thirds diamonds and one - third rubies . if the probability of randomly selecting two diamonds from the bag , without replacement , is 5 / 12 , what is the probability of selecting two rubies from the bag , without replacement ?
the length of a room is 6 m and width is 4.75 m . what is the cost of paying the floor by slabs at the rate of rs . 900 per sq . metre .
the sum of two consecutive integers is 41 . find the numbers .

the jogging track in a sports complex is 660 m in circumference . deepak and his wife start from the same point and walk in opposite directions at 4.5 km / hr and 3.75 km / hr respectively . they will meet for the first time in ?
a rectangular plot measuring 90 metres by 60 metres is to be enclosed by wire fencing . if the poles of the fence are kept 5 metres apart , how many poles will be needed ?
what is the number of integers from 1 to 1000 ( inclusive ) that are divisible by neither 11 nor by 30 ?
if a - b = 2 and a 2 + b 2 = 25 , find the value of ab .
a box contains 7 purple , 5 blue and 11 yellow balls . what is the minimum number of tries required to get one blue and one yellow ball ?

in country z , 10 % of the people do not have a university diploma but have the job of their choice , and 30 % of the people who do not have the job of their choice have a university diploma . if 40 % of the people have the job of their choice , what percent of the people have a university diploma ?
a 90 - liter solution of cool - drink is made from 5 % jasmine water . if 6.5 liters of jasmine and 13.5 liters of water were added to the solution , what percent of the solution is jasmine ?

eddy and freddy start simultaneously from city a and they travel to city b and city c respectively . eddy takes 3 hours and freddy takes 3 hours to complete the journey . if the distance between city a and city b is 600 kms and city a and city c is 300 kms . what is the ratio of their average speed of travel ? ( eddy : freddy )
how much water must be added to 68 litres of milk at 1 1 ⁄ 2 litres for 20 so as to have a mixture worth 10 2 ⁄ 3 a litre ?
find the principle on a certain sum of money at 5 % per annum for 4 years if the amount being rs . 1120 ?
if n = 2.0254 and n * is the decimal obtained by rounding n to the nearest hundredth , what is the value of n * – n ?
in a school 10 % of the boys are same in number as 1 / 2 th of the girls . what is the ratio of boys to the girls in the school ?
the number 500 can be written as the sum of the squares of 2 different positive integers . what is the difference of these 2 integers ?
population is 24000 . population increases by 10 % every year , then the population after 3 years is ?
what will be the cost of building a fence around a square plot with area equal to 289 sq ft , if the price per foot of building the fence is rs . 57 ?
david obtained 70 , 60 , 78 , 60 and 65 marks ( out of 100 ) in english , mathematics , physics , chemistry and biology what are his average marks ?
how many cubes of 2 cm edge can be cut out of a cube of 24 cm edge
if each participant of a chess tournament plays exactly one game with each of the remaining participants , then 136 games will be played during the tournament . find the number of participants .
if the sides of a triangle are 196 cm , 81 cm and 277 cm , what is its area ?
if 35 % of the 880 students at a certain college are enrolled in biology classes , how many students at the college are not enrolled in a biology class ?
the average weight of a group of boys is 30 kg . after a boy of weight 35 kg joins the group , the average weight of the group goes up by 1 kg . find the number of boys in the group originally ?
a boat covers a certain distance downstream in 1 hour , while it comes back in 1.30 hours . if the speed of the stream be 3 kmph , what is the speed of the boat in still water ?
two negative numbers are multiplied to give a product of 48 . if the lesser number is 10 less than thrice the greater number , what is the greater number ?
caleb spends $ 64.50 on 50 hamburgers for the marching band . if single burgers cost $ 1.00 each and double burgers cost $ 1.50 each , how many double burgers did he buy ?
a dealer purchased an article at 3 / 4 of its list price and sold 50 % more than the list price . find his gain percent ?
on a scale of map , 0.4 cm represents 5.3 km . if the distance between the points on the map is 64 cm , the actual distance between these points is :
ratio of two numbers x and y is 2 : 5 . if x is increased by 50 % and y is increased by 8 then the new ratio becomes 3 : 10 . what is the ratio 3 y : ( x + 6 )
if 4 / p = 8 & 4 / q = 18 then p - q = ?
a man â € ™ s current age is ( 2 / 5 ) of the age of his father . after 10 years , he will be ( 1 / 2 ) of the age of his father . what is the age of father at now ?
the price of 2 saris and 4 shirts is rs . 1600 . with the same money one can buy 1 saree and 6 shirts . if one wants to buy 12 shirts , how much shall he have to pay ?
two unbiased coins are tossed . find the probability of getting at most one head ?

of the families in city x in 1956 , 25 percent owned a personal computer . the number of families in city x owning a computer in 1960 was 15 percent greater than it was in 1956 , and the total number of families in city x was 5 percent greater in 1956 than it was in 1960 . what percent of the families in city x owned a personal computer in 1960 ?
excluding stoppages , the speed of a train is 54 kmph and including stoppages it is 40 kmph . of how many minutes does the train stop per hour ?
the least common multiple of positive integer d and 3 - digit integer n is 690 . if n is not divisible by 3 and d is not divisible by 2 , what is the value of n ?
when tossed , a certain coin has equal probability of landing on either side . if the coin is tossed 3 times , what is the probability that it will land twice on heads and once on tails ?
how many positive integers less than 8,000 are there in which the sum of the digits equals 5 ?

the average ( arithmetic mean ) of 16 students first quiz scores in a difficult english class is 61.5 . when one student dropped the class , the average of the remaining scores increased to 64.0 . what is the quiz score of the student who dropped the class ?
the sum of the present ages of two persons a and b is 60 . if the age of a is twice that of b , find the sum of their ages 2 years hence ?
the product of two positive integers is 783 and their difference is 2 . what is the bigger number ?

anup manages to draw 7 circles of equal radii with their centres on the diagonal of a square such that two extreme circles touch two sides of the square and each middle circle touches two circles on either side . find the ratio of radius of the circles to the side of the square .

the total price of a basic computer and printer are $ 2,500 . if the same printer had been purchased with an enhanced computer whose price was $ 500 more than the price of the basic computer , then the price of the printer would have been 1 / 6 of that total . what was the price of the basic computer ?
what will be the cost of house to paint which area equal to 484 sq ft , if the price per foot of building is rs . 20
p can do a work in 15 days and q cando the same work in 20 days . if they can work together for 4 days , what is the fraction of work left ?
a student chose a number , multiplied it by 2 , then subtracted 148 from the result and got 110 . what was the number he chose ?

10 business executives and 7 chairmen meet at a conference . if each business executive shakes the hand of every other business executive and every chairman once , and each chairman shakes the hand of each of the business executives but not the other chairmen , how many handshakes would take place ?
